title: Timber cranes
summary: A timber crane, designed for extracting timber from woodland, and either cab or timber trailer mounted

eligible.eligibleBullet02: be either cab mounted, mountable using 3-point linkage to a tractor, or fit on to a timber trailer
eligible.eligibleBullet03: be designed for extracting timber from woodland
eligible.eligibleBullet04: be fitted to existing tractors or forestry trailers
eligible.eligibleBullet05: have a reach of at least 6m
eligible.eligibleBullet06: have a lift capacity of at least 500kg at 6m reach
eligible.eligibleBullet07: have a rotator, and grab and valve block
eligible.eligibleText01: Other forms of cranes are not eligible under this item.
eligible.eligibleText02: You must not apply for this item if youâ€™re applying for a forwarder where the crane is included.
